description: Toolkit to be used with ask-sdk to simplify Alexa development.
name: alexa-toolkit

scripts.test: export ENVIRONMENT=dev-test&&export S3_BUCKET=alexa-s3-bucket-dev&&export ANALYTICS_PROVIDER=dashbot&&export ANALYTICS_TOKEN=analyticsToken&& mocha --recursive --reporter spec
scripts.test-coverage: export ENVIRONMENT=dev-test&&export S3_BUCKET=alexa-s3-bucket-dev&&export ANALYTICS_PROVIDER=dashbot&&export ANALYTICS_TOKEN=analyticsToken&& nyc mocha --recursive --reporter spec && nyc report --reporter=html
